channel.title: How to increase damage? 317
channel.description:
Alright ive been browing through forums for a few days now and I see ways to increase the damage for lets say Dragon claws, or anything really and ive seen its in the client.java but with searching and searching I have found nothing in where i could change with the attack damage and the spec damage. So if you could direct me to a post where it was said, or just quickly explain it on how to do it would be great!
Thanks

item.title: How to increase damage? 317
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

[quote=“Benjamin1160, post:1, topic:423820”]Alright ive been browing through forums for a few days now and I see ways to increase the damage for lets say Dragon claws, or anything really and ive seen its in the client.java but with searching and searching I have found nothing in where i could change with the attack damage and the spec damage. So if you could direct me to a post where it was said, or just quickly explain it on how to do it would be great!

Thanks[/quote]
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15027) {
maxHit *= 2.00;
}
thats in combat assistant, that increases maxhit by double, (this is for pi btw)

Read full topic
